description:
Calorie Calculator lets you accurately track and view your eating and exercise lifestyle.  Instantly see today's calories so you know when to speed up or slow down.  This app is loaded with over 7500+ different food items; it also includes a wide variety of fast food and take-out restaurants.  Calorie Calculator provides a daily calorie count and log of your eaten foods and workouts, you can also view your eating/workout logs from a previous date!  The GUI is simple and allows you to add custom food items to the database, once you add it you'll never need to input it again!
||||UPDATE INFORMATION||||
Calorie Calculator V1.7 - Fixed loading times, added loading bars for splash screen/profile load/search database, changed GUI buttons/icons, added about page for comments and bug reports, modified manual food dialog (now asks to add manual item to today's eat log), added dialogue for 'no result' searches, increased font size for database.
||||UPCOMING UPDATE INFORMATION||||
Upcoming updates:
More Food Items!!
BMI Calculator (Body Mass Index)
Pre-programmed Workouts
Categorized Search Results (easier searching)
||||MESSAGE FROM US||||
Thanks for your input and keep the feedback coming!  Please update your reviews as needed.
